message: I propose dividing the $100 in a 3:1 ratio, giving you $25 and receiving $75. This ensures a fair share considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60:40 split in my favor. While we both lose value over time, this offers a more balanced starting point for negotiation.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 55:45 split, giving you $45 and receiving $55. This maintains a reasonable balance while accounting for the decreasing value of money in future rounds.
